titleStmt.title: Synesis pneumatikē, or, The causes waies & means of understanding the mind of God as revealed in his word, with assurance therein and a declaration of the perspicuity of the scriptures, with the external means of the interpretation of them / by John Owen ...
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
